profile:
Carpet & Rug Retailers, Floor Laying & Refinishing, Floor Retailers

Alliance Floor Source is a Toronto-based hardwood, laminate and carpeting specialist. We sell only top quality merchandise and offer the best brands in the industry.  We offer flooring products for the "do-it-yourselfer" or we can professionally install it for you. In either case, we believe in providing only the best in products and customer service. 
Selecting the appropriate flooring is an investment that will prove to be one of the smartest and most durable you'll make. As one of the most important design elements in any home or business, hardwood, laminate and cork flooring are used everywhere to give warmth, a distinguished look and a timeless beauty to any room. Whether you require a new floor or a retrofit of an existing floor in either a residential or commercial property, we will do our best to find the most suitable option for your particular needs and budget.
We have been satisfying the needs of homeowners, contractors and builders for almost 25 years.  When dealing with Alliance Floor Source you will not only be satisfied with the quality of our products, but you will also love (we hope and trust) the exceptional customer service and our commitment to making your flooring project a most enjoyable experience.
With your cooperation in the after installation care and maintenance of your new floor, you will have an investment to be happy about and be satisfied with for many years to come.

profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

P&P General Contractors Inc. is a family owned and operated business with excellent references provided by many satisfied customers.  With more than 15 years of experience and many satisfied customers our company is strongly committed to provide high quality of craftsmanship to each and every customer.

P & P General Contractors Inc. is a licensed company and for our customer's protection we carry both liability and worker's compensation insurance on all our workers and subcontractors.  We are a start to finish company and we stand behind all projects performed and backs them with a full 1 YEAR WARRANTY.

We take pride in our perform, thus our customers can always be assured that only the most experienced and qualified people are serving them.  Our top priority is our customers satisfaction and our teams objective is to transform your renovation wish list into a reality.

profile:
YOU DREAM IT - WE BUILD IT - 2 WEEKS - WE WILL BEAT ANY COMPETITORS WRITTEN PRICE QUOTATION BY A MINIMUM OF 5% - NO QUESTIONS ASKED - JUST CONTACT US

Finished Basement.ca, (ISM Renobuilders Inc.) is a family-owned and operated business. We specialize in basement renovations providing our customers with a finished basement that is professionally-built with high quality products and materials and finished with old-world craftsmanship, pride and attention to detail. 

Thinking about a Basement Renovation?

Finishedbasement.ca has been providing exceptional basement renovation services in the GTA since 1996. Converting people's dark damp basement's into clean, comfortable and fun living spaces.

We also offer unique, custom designs and consolations in interior decorating provided directly by the founder and owner, who personally oversees and manages all projects. 

Come visit our 3000sq. ft. showroom located in Mississauga. We have just recently added a new addition featuring: Limestone, Marble, Infrared Sauna's, Steam Shower Display and LED Lighting!!!!! 

Also offering in-house Audio Visual solutions by: Pure Custom Integrations. WHo help you understand tomorrows technology TODAY! Specializing in: Home Theatres, Home Automation, Home Integration....and more!

Unable to make it out to our showroom? No problem! Visit our website to explore more photos, video testimonials and our blog.


Thank you from the Finished Basement Crew for taking the time to check us out!

services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Timeless in style, dependable in performance and exceptional in design, look to Rockstella Stonery to craft the perfect granite, marble or quartz countertop for your home or office. A natural option for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities and tub surrounds, these materials are also excellent alternatives for fireplaces, bar tops, reception desks and more. We handle all aspects of design, fabrication and installation, and are always prepared to take on a variety of projects, from single vanities to full-scale home installs to multi-unit projects.

***

We distinguish the caliber of our work at Rockstella not just through outstanding craftsmanship and affordable pricing, but more importantly, through an unparalleled level of service. We’ve earned a reputation for being timely, approachable and efficient, and we always plan our consults and installs at a time that suits your schedule – whether it’s business hours, weekends or after hours. It also bears pointing out that we work directly with you – there are no sub-contractors involved – from on-site measuring to individual slab selection to professional installation.

***

At Rockstella Stonery, we like to refer to the unique style and design of our stone options as affordable luxury – an option that will stand out in your home or place of work and that will endure for ages. We’re based in Stoney Creek, and are ready to provide our services to clients throughout Hamilton, Niagara region and GTA.

profile:
416-771-6730    OR   416-771-7984

CLI Electric is a full service residential, commercial and industrial electrical contractor located in Toronto, Ontario.  We provide service to all of the GTA and surrounding area.  From a quick troubleshoot, or a major project, CLI Electric will take care of ALL of your electrical needs.  Give us a call today, and see what it feels like to work with the BEST!

WE'RE THE GOOD GUYS YOUR FRIENDS AND FAMILY TOLD YOU ABOUT

SERVICE *** EXPERTISE *** VALUE *** INTEGRITY

WE ARE THE EXPERTS TO CALL WHEN IT COMES TO KNOB AND TUBE WIRING, ALUMINUM WIRE RECONDITIONING, PANEL & SERVICE UPGRADES, POTLIGHTS AND MORE.

CLI Electric is proud to be recognized as a member of the Electrical Safety Authority's (ESA) and Authorized Contractor Program (ACP). The Authorized Contractor Program was developed by ESA to identify those Contractors who consistently perform Ontario Electrical Safety Code compliant work at a level that reinforces public electrical safety.

The Authorized Contractor Program boasts that only the best Electrical Contractors are current members - only those Electrical Contractors who do consistent, code-compliant work, are allowed on and are permitted to remain on, the Program. As a result, the ESA will selectively inspect work done by CLI Electric rather than conduct full electrical inspections.

By using CLI Electric, our clients experience the following benefits:
•	Uninterrupted workflow.
•	Reduced electrical service downtime during renovation.
•	Increased compliance to the Electrical Safety Code that equates to increased electrical safety.
•	Security of knowing that ESA constantly monitors CLI Electric's work, ensuring we meet the stringent requirements laid out in the Authorized Contractor Program criteria.

The Electrical Safety Authority is the authority responsible for public safety in Ontario. ESA is working to ensure that electrical installations in Ontario meet the Code requirements of the Ontario Electrical Safety Code. This Code requires that an application for inspection be filed with ESA for electrical installations and wiring done in your home or business facility.

Looking for worry-free electrical work done right?  Then call us today to schedule your appointment for a free estimate.  With over 15 years experience our superior quality workmanship and expertise is second to none and our work is fully guaranteed 100% for your piece-of-mind.

In our effort to provide home and business owners with the best services we have partnered with long time trade associates to offer renovation and general contracting services to our valued customers.   Call us today to discuss your renovation or building project, we will take you from start to finish with zero headaches.

CALL TODAY FOR PROFESSIONAL, FRIENDLY AND EXPERT SERVICE.

CLI ELECTRIC INC. www.clielectric.ca 
clielectric1@gmail.com

Find us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/clielectric 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/CLIElectricInc 
Find us on Linkedin: http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=81637549

We were recently featured in Top Choice Business Magazine as The Best Electrical Contractor in the GTA!!!! here is the link to the article:

http://topchoicemagazine.com/businesses/cli-electric

416-771-6730 OR 416-771-7984

profile:
True North Underpinning is a company fully dedicated to lowering basements of Toronto homes. We have vast experience with all the varieties of houses in Toronto including heritage homes that are over 140 years old, townhouses, detached and semi-detached homes.
 
We can provide a higher quality service with our True North Underpinning crews who are trained underpinning specialists. You will be assigned a crew that is both professional and courteous. They will see your project through from beginning to end.
 
When it comes to underpinning your home don't leave it to amateurs or less experienced companies.  A major renovation such as this should be done by professionals. 
True North Underpinning is proud of our reputation of completing jobs on time and on budget, with the highest quality of workmanship and cleanliness.
 
Call us for a free site inspection followed by a detailed and itemized estimate. . We are fully licensed and insured including mandatory underpinning insurance.
 
Underpinning, Basement Lowering, Bench Footings, Internal Waterproofing, Structural Steel Beams and Posts, Basement Walk-outs, Crawl Spaces, Basement Plumbing, Weeping Tiles, and Sump pits

profile:
Structural Restoration Systems is a family run business that has been servicing the Greater Toronto Area for over 40 years. Over this time we have gained the trust of many top home builders, property management companies and hundreds of individual homeowners. If you are looking for a trusted contractor, look no further your experience with us is the most important thing! We provide free quotes!  

**We've won 'best of' Homestars 4 years in a row for our customer service and workmanship**

We offer a variety of services that include but are not limited to; renovations (washrooms, basements, floor plan improvements, demolition etc.), drywall repairs, exterior waterproofing, interior foundation crack repairs, fences, decks, masonry repairs including; chimneys, brick replacement, tuck pointing and concrete repairs. We also provide mini excavator services. We have remained in business for over 40 years because we always give our customers the best experience possible. We pride ourselves on receiving repeat business and recommendations. Not sure if we can help you on your project, click above on the "get a quote" button, visit our website www.srstoronto.ca or give us a call. No job is too small!
warranty_terms: 1 to 10 years depending on the job type

profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile:
RM Renovation is a Toronto based renovation company with more than 20 years experience in the field.
.
WE ARE THE TEAM OF PROFESSIONALS WHO PERFORM KITCHEN, BATH OR BASEMENT RENOVATIONS ACCORDING TO YOUR PERSONAL PROJECT.
.
Our major activities are renovating basements, kitchens and bathrooms at reasonable prices. Trusting such works to us our clients have convinced in their quality and fast performing. We provide high-quality construction and renovation services as well as give maximum guarantee for our services. Depending on the project we perform our interior design, wall insulation and finishing.

Our advantages:

Quality and efficiency. We provide preparing and performing works as soon as possible.
Years of experience. We are in the renovation services market for many years and have an excellent reputation and hundreds of grateful customers.
Individual approach. We approach responsibly to perform each order and find the best options for the task as well as advise customers in order to meet all their individual needs.
Highly qualified specialists. We are a team of professionals and perform our work efficiently and reliably. Our employees keep their skills always according to the up to date requirements.
Customers positive reviews. We have a lot of positive feedback from the customers.
.
.
Basement renovation:

Basement in a private house more often perceived as a technical room: storeroom for garden tools or a cellar to store the harvest. Meanwhile, the basement is easy can turn into a full room to organize here, for example, a vinotheque, bar, home theatre or billiard room. The kitchen in the basement is also becoming a very popular modern solution. Construction and repair of the basement or ground floor, of course, will transform your home by adding not only the living space but also personality.

The following work can be done during the basement renovation.

Waterproofing. This is necessary if the moisture on the room walls revealed.

Heating. If the room is designed for staying long (kitchen, library, bathroom), it should be warm enough in any case.

Thermal insulation. This feature will save on heating and prevent heat loss into the ground and it will greatly enhance the energy efficiency of the whole building.

Lighting. If the basement has a small level above the soil it can be equipped with energy-saving windows. Additional electric light point sources using LED lamps will be created as well.

Soundproofing will be installed if the basement room contains equipment that generates big noise (e.g. water pumps etc.).

Water supply and sewerage. These works are performed accordingly to the local water company. Additional pumps can be installed if necessary.

Networks for the power supply, LAN or television can be laid, so it will provide you with maximum comfort.
.
.
Kitchen renovation:

The kitchen is one of the most visited places in your house. That is why it is so important that this room should be cozy and functional. We will do for you all kinds of our works for any areas of the rooms, from small to large ones. These will be the following:

1. Replacing the wires.

2. Aligning the surfaces of the ceiling and walls.

3. Laying the floor and wall tiles.

4. Floor, ceiling and general kitchen equipment installation.

5. Kitchen windows replacement.

6. Home appliances integration.

We always use safe and easy to wash materials.
.
.
Bathrooms renovation:

We are trying to renovate the bathroom as soon as possible because we well know this room is essentially the most important thing in your home. This type of repair involves the following:

1. Initial preparing the room, dismounting the wires, old tiles and plumbing communications.

2. Installation of new wiring, plumbing pipes, risers.

3. Preparing the walls, floor and ceiling.

4. Installation the new door and windows.

5. Installing the tiles on the floor and walls.

6. Installation of the new ceiling and lighting.

7. Installation of new connections to the water supply and sanitation.

8. Installation of all sanitary equipment and electric wash machine if needed.

We work at any time convenient for you. We are looking forward to meeting you!

Euro Choice Windows & Doors was founded in 1998. Our company specializes in the manufacturing and installation of European style and design windows and doors, energy efficient UPVC vinyl windows, sliding doors, steel entrance doors and fibreglass doors. profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

Our Company is teamed up with a group of experienced and talented consultants that will provide a one- stop place for all your design and building permit needs.Architectural Services will assist you with building permits that will enhance your porch, deck, garage, basement, kitchen, bathroom, or the house overall. Services cover also such delicate matters as Stop Work Order, Order to Comply, Zoning Reviews, Land Severance, Committee of Adjustment Applications, and Ontario Municipal Board Applications.
Our Structural Consultant can provide services that vary in size and complexity, from just evaluating an existing building and providing the Owner with necessary documentation as required by City Officials and Ontario Building Code to designing structural components of a new building.

Our Services:
Bathroom renovation 
Basement renovation
Home Addition
Kitchen renovation
 Condo renovation
General Work

profile:
We have been providing our construction services for almost 15 years helping our clients to renovate and enhance their living space. Novacon Construction Inc are a full DESIGN-BUILD firm focusing on large scale higher end Major renovations, Home additions and full Custom Homes. We are a very well planned company that work well with clients that are looking for a high end/professional building experience and not a jack of all trades approach. Our clients work with a professional DESIGN-BUILD team that consists of in house designer, Project manager, Site supervisor and tradesman for the duration of their build.
 
Our aim is to produce a high quality product, to perform in the most efficient way possible, and to make your renovation a positive and rewarding experience. All our trades people are highly skilled and bring with them a wealth of experience. NOVACON Custom Builders & Renovators are equipped to work on any area of your home, from major additions, basements, to bathrooms, including kitchen development and we can even build your dream home!
 
A satisfied customer is our best advertisement!!!.

profile:
Capable Group 

Residential Renovations Toronto:-
 
Professional residential renovations can breathe new life into your Toronto home. Whether you are seeking renovations to just one room, the whole house, the exterior or the interior, The Able Group can provide you with everything you need from design to planning to execution, with our building supplies in Toronto.
 
Whether your renovation requirements are something very practical such as updating an outdated kitchen or whether you would like to splurge on a home theatre room for your basement, The Able Group are prepared to take care of your residential renovation needs.
 
Construction Managment:-
We have developed a very comprehensive Construction Management service that has resulted in exceptional projects for countless clients. Please take a minute to review the following information to better understand how we can reliably deliver your project on-time and on-budget.
 
Basement Renovation:-
Of all home renovations, kitchen and basement remodels offer the best financial return. But there’s a caveat with basements: the quality of the new space must match the rest of the house to warrant asking for a higher selling price.

profile:
Jiang's Home Renovation Inc consists teams of true hardworking Asian employees. 

Our main values are customer satisfaction and best quality jobs.

We specialize in: 
* Full House Renovation -> approximately 2  -3 months from basement to third floor
* Full Basement renovation (From start to finish approximately 4 weeks)
* Bathroom/Kitchen Refacing (New backsplash,vanity,cabinets, counter-tops installation) 
* Ceramic, Porcelain or any other types of Tile Installation - 100% flat/level result
* Vinyl, Hardwood, Engineered wood or Laminate Flooring 
* Interior and Exterior paintings include rooms, ceilings, garage doors, windows,doors, deck and fences. 
* Crown Moulding, Drywall, concrete repairs, Gutter cleaning /windows/doors caulking or re-caulking 
* Lights/furniture dissemble and re-assemble  

***Golden Rule*** -100% customer satisfaction.

- send us a picture or two of the design you want, we will communicate, help design and work with your budgets in order to achieve expected maximum result.

We have expanded and own a crew of professional team doing exterior jobs: Backyard landscaping, New fencing, Decking, Interlocking at a very satisfactory price. 

Referrals available upon request.


Any small or big jobs, we take them seriously, give us a chance to show you that we are worth hiring.

In addition to Pine, Spruce, Cedar, and Poplar, we also work with more artisan species such as Maple, Oak, American Cherry, Walnut, and Ash. Exotic species including but not limited to Rosewood, Teak, Mahogany, Gum-wood, and Ebony, may also be sourced for your particular project.
We also have sources for both domestic and exotic veneered products.

profile:
Thank you for considering our services. 

Continental Brothers Construction has been in business for over 15 years. Framing, drywall and complete basement and bathroom renovations are what we are best at. And we know, finding the right contractor to do your important work can be a time-consuming endeavor. We are passionate about the work that we do and go to great lengths to ensure your basement and bathroom renovation feels, works and looks unbelievably great. So, whether it be a small home renovation or a large commercial project, we can provide you the best quality at competitive prices. Call us and ask how we can help with your next renovation. 

Please see pictures of recently completed projects below and should you have any further questions, don't hesitate to ask.

Additional references available upon request.

Continental Brothers Construction Inc.

profile:
"Constructing your visions from concept to creation."

With more than 14+ years in the General Contracting trade, Brute Construction Services has provided clients with top quality Renovations and Customer Service. We thrive on making our client's home or commercial renovation ideas come to fruition. 

From Design - To Furnishing, we take our clients step by step through the process to guarantee invisioned results.  By having a complete in-house staff, we can assure competitive pricing, quality assurance and an outstanding on-time performance.

Brute Construction Services has serviced the Greater Toronto Area with dedicated development and renovations. We treat each project with extraordinary attention and have established a reputation as one of Ontario's premier Contractors by sustaining solid relationships with our clients and business partners. 

With up to 15 Million dollar insurance, WSIB, WHIMIS, Working at Heights, Heavy Equipment License, and many other construction-related certifications. We are Positive in ensuring that our clients, tradespeople, and job site are safe and up to code. 

A COVID-19 POLICY AND PROCEDURE is in place to fully protect our client's and trade's safety at all times.

Kristian - Sales Development Specialist

Hello prospective client! Thank you for stopping by. 

Top Renovations is a highly professional construction business based in Toronto, offering 30 years of experience and workmanship to residential and commercial clients all across the GTA. Top Renovations primarily specializes in services such as interior home renovations including, but not limited to full kitchen, bathroom, and basement renovations. In addition, demolition, framing, remodelling, flooring, tiling, painting, carpentry, and finish carpentry are also provided.

From planning and execution of custom homes (beginning to end) to condos, basements, kitchens, bathrooms and flooring renovations, we have the tools, skills and experience to help you make your renovation dreams a reality.

profile:
APV Reno are experienced and highly skilled general contractors, home renovation specialists, and painters providing both residential and commercial general contracting needs in Toronto, Downtown Toronto, North York, Mississauga, Etobicoke and GTA areas in Ontario.

We are licensed home renovators & general contractors with over 20 years of successful experience in home renovations, residential & commercial general contracting, and painting. We also work with other professional construction trades across Toronto and the GTA.

APV Reno’s core business is in Design & Renovations. We specialize in home additions, basement renovations, basement finishing, kitchen renovations, bathroom renovations, and general higher-end residential construction.

Other home improvement services include both interior and exterior painting (residential, commercial, and industrial), interior and exterior renovations, as well as fulfilling the procurement process to acquire building permits in the City of Toronto and the GTA.

Our honesty, professionalism and meticulous attention to detail has granted us our success in the cutthroat general contractors and home renovations industry. This has subsequently helped our company build long-term relationships with both clients and contractors, enabling us to steadily grow over the last 20+ years. As a valued client, you can have complete confidence in our work.

Lastly, our integrity in achieving success on every contract or job regardless of how small or large the project, is the core component to our success. All in all, we strive to be a highly reputable and one of the best general contractors in Toronto.

profile:
Thank you for visiting HTR Basements. As one of GTA's leading basement finishing and basement contractors, we are committed to providing our customers with unparalleled value.
***
Our master craftsmen and our passion are what sets us apart from other basement finishing companies.
Basement finishing is a big investment, and it’s important to make a well-informed decision when it comes to choosing a basement contractor. High Tech Reno is fully insured, licensed, and has the experience to deliver quality finished basements. We specialize in basement designing, basement finishing, and remodeling basements in the GTA and surrounding areas. A finished basement can be a real asset to your home’s long-term equity and provide functional new living space for your family to enjoy. Entertainment areas and playrooms are perfect solutions for growing families. Home offices, exercise rooms, and additional bedrooms are also popular choices for homeowners looking for more usable living space. Whatever your needs are for your basement finishing project, our basement specialists can meet your needs with the perfectly finished basement. Contact us today at 905-754-4696 to get a free estimate and start your basement remodeling process.
***
HTR Basements experts provide quality basement renovation services throughout the GTA. HTR Basements is The Best Basement Renovation company with a mission: Give customers the best basements, bathrooms and kitchens, at the most affordable price without compromising quality and service. When GTA homeowners choose High Tech Renovation as their Basement Finishing contractor, they are pleasantly surprised by our personal approach to the remodeling process and our dedication to their comfort and enjoyment throughout each stage. We treat each and every job as if it were in our own home.
***
We look forward to adding you and your basement to our ever-growing list of basement remodeling successes!

Finding your perfect home renovation partner can understandably be a daunting process these days. With so many options and potential risks, people are looking for a partner they can trust.

That's why Royal Home Improvements (RHI) retains single-source responsibility from start to finish. Our hand's on approach ensures your needs are met, from concept to construction. profile:
The Concord Group began as a carpet cleaning company in 1983. As our business gained a reputation for quality and customer satisfaction, we began receiving requests for other services. Eventually the volume of requests led us to expand to renovations, interior and exterior decor, painting, electrical, plumbing, and a number of other services.

The Concord Group has become a one-stop-shop for all your home and business needs. We began as a small family organization and although we have grown ten-fold throughout the years, we maintain our dedication to providing a friendly and courteous environment. We pride ourselves on our prompt reliable service, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

We offer water and flood damage repair, waterproofing, mould removal, carpet cleaning, and home renovations and restoration. We pride ourselves on our prompt reliable service, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

profile:
The Preferred Home and Bath (PHAB) family works to improve the quality of life of our customers in the form of well-designed, well-planned, and well-executed interior renovations. We strive to create trusted, ongoing relationships with our customers that see them through every life stage of home ownership from their 1st home reno to their forever home.

PLANNING AND PERMITTING
Preferred Home and Bath has decades of experience with the Ontario Building Code and will always follow its principles by default.

DESIGN
Our designer will first create your space, to scale, in 3D so that you can collaborate on the best possible layout for your lifestyle. Guided material selections will help you create a warm and inviting atmosphere that matches your personal style.

PROJECT MANAGEMENT
Our project managers have years of hands-on construction knowledge that pair perfectly with modern project management techniques to create a seamless process that always produces a happy customer. We value our continued relationship.

profile:
WE PROVIDE ONE-STOP RENOVATION SERVICES IN TORONTO

Our approach is unique: it aims to build a long-term relationship with its clientele. Our mission is to provide each one of our customers with the highest level of quality construction services at a competitive price and timely completion.

What makes us different from our competitors is that our cutting-edge technologies will surely guarantee your basement finishing and renovation is done as swiftly and as quickly as possible.

TORONTO BASEMENT RENOVATION
At Lantern Construction we work with a team of specialists with 5 to 20 years of experience in Toronto basement renovation. When you choose to work with us, you can be certain your project will be completed fast, correctly, and up to code. Moreover, the project is never done until you are 100% satisfied.

FREE DETAILED QUOTE
Submit your budget through our online form and we will give you a detailed quote on your basement renovation on the spot. If you like what you see, get in touch with us to discuss all your options. We are ready and fully equipped to bring your basement dream into reality.

COMPETITIVELY PRICED
The average cost of a basement finish in Toronto is about $35 to $55 per square foot. Our prices reflect the full process and include the costs for design, materials, labor, and cleaning. Get in touch with us today for a detailed estimate.

YEARS OF CONSTRUCTION AND DESIGN EXPERIENCE
The construction industry is about people and good communication. Each one of us spends the vast majority of our life in a structure that was built by our hands.

profile:
Renovations Contractor servicing Toronto and the GTA.

Our areas of expertise include full home renovation, including basement, kitchen, and bathroom renovation. Additionally, we offer flooring & tiling services, drywall installation & painting, design consulting, home extensions and additions with permits, and custom built-ins.

Our team is led by an experienced Construction Project Manager (MJ) and an Architect (Maz), with long years of experience in residential and commercial construction and renovation. Fully licensed, insured & WSIB certified, we complete our projects smoothly and professionally from start to finish, within the specified budget and time frame, guaranteeing our clients complete satisfaction.

profile:
For over 10 years, KAR Renovation has offered an innovative and professional approach to home renovations. We can transform any room in your home from kitchens, bathrooms and basements to whole house projects, everything from start to finish.

​

We would provide you with a first class facility, from a function, aesthetic and economical view point.

​You can be confident that with KAR Renovation your home is in good hands. We will help you obtain the best value for your investment by providing a quality project completed Safely, On-Time and On Budget.

​Our Mission is to create the smoothest, most enjoyable renovation experience possible for homeowners, We watch over everything such as safety, protection of items that are valuable, and protecting areas of your home that are not affected by the renovation.

​We bring our services anywhere in Toronto GTA, Scarborough, Markham, Richmond Hill, Vaughan, Brampton, Mississauga, Oakville, Pickering, and Ajax.

​It is very important to us that our clients are happy and comfortable with their project long after we’re gone. We make sure you’re fully satisfied with the final results.

​Call Us today for free consultation

profile:
Why Trust Us?
From the day we got into business, our goal has been to work on every house as if it were our own. By combining the finest craftsmanship with a level of attention to detail you won’t find anywhere else in the Toronto Area, we’ve made it possible for anyone to create their dream backyard with nothing more than a quick call to the experts they can trust.

Life and Nature...
Everything we do is built from our love of nature and the great outdoors which we get from our founders. They fell in love with woodwork and construction, and decided to create a business that allowed them to share their passion with people right across the local area. At that moment Yardcore Landscaping Design was born and we haven’t looked back since.

By working side by side with every customer and client, we can offer the expert input and finishing touches you won’t find anywhere else. For us it’s not about finishing the job as quickly as possible and moving on to the next property. It’s about creating something that’s built to last that the owners can enjoy for years to come. That way when you hire our team to create the backyard you’ve always wanted, you can sleep with the peace of mind that only comes from knowing you’ve partnered with a team that cares as much about the end result as you do.



Stand on Quality...
We take pride in what we do, and go to great lengths to ensure every fence we erect and deck we lay fits seamlessly into its surroundings. It’s an approach that allows you to reconnect with nature, celebrate everything it has to offer, and enjoy your new space like never before. Not only that, but we also truly believe in what we do. That’s why we offer an exclusive 5 year workmanship warranty with everything we put our name to.

Whether you’re putting the finishing touches to a brand new property, or treating a much loved property to something new, we’re always ready and waiting to lend a hand. It means when you want quality craftsmanship, expert after service, and a team that will always get the job done right the first time, all you have to do is ask.

Life is just better that way.

With over 15 years experience The Blanas Group Design + Construction is a full service licensed full design-build renovation firm.  We specialize in all interior alterations to any property.  We thrive on all our full interior remodels, legal basement apartments and kitchens. 

We also have a separate division for kitchen and bath sale and installations.  We are authorized distributor of Canadian made semi customizable ready to assemble kitchen cabinetry  and bathroom vanities; which we offer sale and installation services for.  We also offer other kitchen items such as kitchen sinks, range hoods and kitchen hardware.  

We service all of the GTA including but not limited to:  Toronto, Etobicoke, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Concord,  Maple, Thornhill, King City, Nobelton, Kleinburg, Richmond Hill, Brampton, Bolton,  North York, Downsview, Oshawa, Ajax, Pickering, Whitby, New Castle, Bomanville, Barrie

profile:
Hello Viewer! 

We offer full turn key solutions for interiors and exterior renovations for a variety of building types. Working at a range of scales, from custom renovation projects for residential market to adaptive reuse of small commercial buildings. The team lists beauty, practicality, and social and environmental sustainability as essentials for ‘healthier and happier buildings’.  


We specialize in the design and renovation management of a variety of spaces which can differ in size and function.  It is through our free consultation that  a picture is painted on what your project and budgetary requirements are.   We will hold your hand as tight as you require and ensure that we listen to your wants and needs.  Once we have a clear picture of scope and budget, our team will estimate and design your space for you accordingly with years of experience and education backing our every decision.   


There is no project to small and no renovation project to large for us to handle.  
-We work with a variety of agents who have clients moving into their new 2 story properties or condos which have very tight time lines.  We have accomplished full 3 story (including basement) renovations in 5 weeks flats when necessary.  
-We have many recurring clients which use our services for each challenge they face.  If you aren't ready to do a full project in a single swing,  we can help you break down the project into proper stepping stones to spend where necessary and when necessary. 


We are a phone call or email away and would be honored to work with you.

profile:
Welcome to ZAFCON INC your professional expert contractor. 

WHO WE ARE
Our company team consist of project managers, engineers, designers, construction and renovation specialists who are experts in their field. This team has worked successfully together to help our customers achieve their construction objective and dream renovations.

OUR CORE VALUES

Safety - We are commitment to safety to ensure everyone can return to their loved ones at the end of the day. As a result, we ensure all team members and all work is in compliance with safety regulations,  WSIB and Covid-19 protocols.

Quality - Quality distinguishes best from the rest. Our craftsmanship approach ensures that all of our clients receive nothing but the best quality service.

Integrity - We don't take the convenient approach but rather the RIGHT one, even if no one is watching.  

Transparency - The most important core value for us is to ensure our customers receive clear terms and conditions upfront. This will help us build long lasting relationships which further fosters our team culture across all levels of skills and management. 

Services we offer:

Full Home Renovations
Home Extensions and Upgrades
Basement Renovations
Kitchen & Bathroom Renovations

Check out our website for more pictures and to get an estimates on your next project or simply call us to discuss what is possible (647) 785-2929

 We are open for business and we are following all Covid-19 regulations.

profile:
About Us
Hausvio Inc is a leading Toronto-based home renovations company. We pride ourselves on our eco-friendly, innovative, and professional approach to all of our home renovation projects. From a brand new kitchen or bathroom to whole house projects, our team works hard to transform your living spaces completely.
​
We believe in a more personal approach to home renovation projects. By working closely with our clients, understanding their goals, and working hard to craft solution-focused designs allows us to create beautifully crafted, functional living spaces.
OUR TEAM
The Hausvio is made of professional, experienced carpenters with over a decade in the industry. Each member is well-known and admired in their field for exceptional quality, attention to detail, and talent. We also collaborate with other local professionals, including Architects, Engineers, Kitchen & Bathroom Designers, Electricians, Plumbers, and other specialized personnel, to guarantee we are providing the highest level of service and care for our clients.

MEET THE FOUNDER
Owner/ CEO Wilson is a Licenced Professional Engineer with over five years of experience in the home renovation field. Wilson is passionate about implementing the best methods and practices to help reduce Hausvio’s carbon footprint.

Hausvio is pursuing a LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) Certificate. LEED is the most widely used green building rating system in Canada and across the globe. LEED is a proven and holistic path to addressing climate change. At Hausvio, we’re committed to creating more resource-efficient, healthy, and resilient homes without compromising design aesthetics, quality, or living convenience.

WHY GO GREEN
Protects Our Ecosystem: Efficient Use of Resources & Energy
Healthier Indoor Environment: Improved Quality of Life
Energy-Efficient: Reduced Operational Cost and Maintenance
Lower Maintenance and Operation Costs
Reduces Strain on Local Resources
services:
Our Services
Your home should perfectly reflect your style, taste, and lifestyle. We listen to your needs, goals, and visions and flawlessly align them with the best building practices to deliver the best possible outcomes for your living spaces.
Kitchen
The kitchen is the heartbeat of the home. At Hausvio, we create kitchens that work for your family, design choices, and your way of living. From contemporary and modern renovations to open concepts and traditional styles, Hausvio works with you to create beautiful, functional kitchens that complement your home’s aesthetic. 
 
Bathroom
Create a luxurious sanctuary in your home. Bathrooms are a place where you can relax, refresh, and rejuvenate. Our team has experience remodeling various bathroom styles, including ensuites, power rooms, and main bathrooms. Whether you want to create a spa-like oasis with a thermostatic shower system or just refresh your cabinetry, our team can help. 
Whole House
Let us help you make your house a home. If you need significant upgrades to your living space to make it work for you and your family, we offer complete house renovations. Typically, whole house renovations include major elements like the kitchen, bathrooms, interior finishes, flooring, and mechanical systems (electrical, plumbing, and HVAC). 
Basement
Finished basements add additional living space while significantly increasing your property value. We offer fully customizable basement renovations to fit your needs. Our team can add vital functional living space and much-needed storage to upgrade your lifestyle. To add even more value to your home, talk to us about including sub-flooring, lighting, a wet bar, laundry room, built-ins, and upgrading insulation.
warranty_terms: Yes. 6 Months on Workmanship.  Kindly ask for more details.

profile:
Marvex Development Corp. is a full service construction company dedicated to building and improving commercial and residential structures according to client needs and desires.Located in Toronto, Ontario we service the GTA and surrounding areas. Our team is ready to give your space whatever updates it requires. We can provide a seamless experience from design to finishing touches, and everything in between. With a passion for building, we believe we can help you make your ideas a reality!


Commercial
Marvex Development Corp. can assist property managers and owners with professional and safe contracting services for lobbies, building envelopes, common elements, and retrofitting suites/units. We only use quality equipment brands and trusted materials to ensure our work is completed to the highest standards. We strive to provide great customer service and clear communication so you can understand the progress of your job at every phase. We are covered by WSIB and have $5M in liability insurance to satisfy the legal requirements for commercial spaces. Get in touch with us to learn more.


Building
Turn your project into the vision of your dreams by utilizing our full building services. Our experts will explain all your options, and answer all of your questions. Our team works closely with each client to make sure we’re meeting – and exceeding – expectations. From the designing/planning stages to final inspection, we can ensure your dream becomes a reality.  Get in touch for more information.


Renovation
We understand the importance of choosing a company that’s experienced, dependable, and affordable.  We have years of experience renovating kitchens and bathrooms, updating electrical and plumbing, redoing floors, installing new doors and trim, painting, decks, walkways and landscaping; just let us know how we can help!


Planning /Design
Need help getting started? Marvex Development Corp. can bring your ideas to life with full-scale drawings, provide you with 3D renderings, and organize a complete finishing materials list for your project. Whether your project needs full planning or just a little help with color selection, we can help.

From the planning and designing phase to the final touches and furniture fittings, we use high quality materials and up-to-date building methods. Maher Construction has built a reputation on, and is committed to, working within the budget, ensuring that all projects are completed as per scope and schedule, and delivering the highest quality of work and service to our clients.

profile:
OUR PROCESS

 

When working with GTCC, you will have access to knowledgeable professionals working cohesively to provide you with a finished product you can be proud of for years to come. We will provide honest answers and insights to any questions or querries you have throughout the process.

First, you will start with a free consultation and estimate. This is where we will go over all of your options and approximate budgets. If you're seeking help with a smaller renovation (kitchen, bathroom, basement), we will provide you a fixed price in this phase.

Should you decide to move forward with us for a custom home addition design paclage, you will then move into the design phase. This is where you will meet with our architects and designers and together come up with a uniquely custom-tailored plan for your new custom renovation or addition.

Once we have engineered drawings for your project, we will then cost the project based on these approved drawings and provide you with a fixed price to execute the work in a timely fashion.

When we have agreed on the scope of work and price the real planning for us begins. We will provide you a project schedule and approximate start and completion date. Product will be ordered and we will be on our way.

Throughout the construction phase of the project, we will be in constant contact with you. We will keep you apprised of any pertinent information regarding your project through email and set weekly meetings.

When the work is complete, we will do a final walkthrough to discuss any potential deficiencies that must be fixed (on our dollar) and hand over the keys to your new home.

profile:
Bianka Design&Build is a full service design and remodeling firm serving Great Toronto Area. Providing complete kitchen and bathroom remodeling, Bianka Design&Build has everything you need from design and supply to installation. We strive to deliver the best in high-value services at the right price for you.

At Bianka Design&Build, we are equal parts builder and designer. Whether you’re looking for modern, traditional, contemporary, rustic or any style in between, our team of interior designers will work with you to identify the look that’s right for your space while our builders execute that plan to create a look that corresponds to your individual taste. Our mission is to provide the highest level of service and quality. There’s not a single design challenge or building constraint that our builders can’t overcome or find a solution for. We treat each remodeling project with the same care we’d want for ourselves, and we’re committed to creating spaces that look and feel the way our clients envision.

profile:
Established in 2004, 51 Construction Ltd. has devoted to providing the highest, safest, most professional and customized construction and renovation services for our clients. With our skillful and experienced workers, supportive and innovative designers and engineers, and good customer relationship team, we have taken pride in serving our clients with the higher quality services, ranging from full-service residential and commercial general contracting, interior buildouts, design-build construction, to remodeling and renovating services, throughout the Greater Toronto Area. 51 Construction has earned a reputation for the quality of work, integrity, and professionalism since its inception.

To better build and renovate homes and offices for our clients, 51 Construction has established its own wood manufacturing plant in uniquely, flawlessly, and professionally designing, producing, installing both residential and commercial cabinets, countertops, reception desk, office cabinetry projects in Ontario. In collaboration with our subsidiaries, affiliates, and partners, we have successfully built our presence in the industry locally and nationally. 

Check out our Cabinetry Website - www.51wood.ca
Check out our Construction Website - www.51builder.com

Give us a call - 416-292-9788, or email - helena@51builder.com

B&B Design is a family owned company originated from 2011. We offer residential and commercial renovations such as kitchen, bathroom, basements, office and many more home additions. We provide exceptional customer service with honest rates and high quality craftsmanship. Our goal is to make your dreams into reality!

Contact Bold & Beautiful Design
416-434-1638
services:
Basement Renovations
B&B design offers many options to customers in order to ensure that the job is done to code. We recommend inspections for plumbing and electrical work, as well as city permits. B&b is committed to making the customers dream a reality by educating and being realistic about the work they want done.

Bathroom Renovations
Bathroom designs come in many shapes and forms. The most important step b&b recommends about renovating bathrooms is to ensure that the room is mold and water proofed. B&B highly recommends schluter products for all of these needs.

Kitchen Renovations
B&b provides engineers and design consultants to help bring a customers thought into reality. B&b takes pride in properly utilizating all of the space available. B&b provides an array of designs and countertops for competitive pricing to make sure each customer get something beautiful and unique.

profile:
R&M Construction, founded in 1976 (incorporated in 1983), is a family owned and operated general contracting company based out of Acton, Ontario. We specialize in the construction and restoration of natural waterways including eroded banks and shorelines. Our goal is to restore the environment to the way it was originally created, protect infrastructure, and improve habitat in an efficient and cost effective manner while minimizing negative effects.

​

Projects include channel improvements, Storm Water Management (SWM) pond retro-fitting and creation, as well as protection of streams, wetlands, and shorelines, and the construction of soil erosion protection zones through bank stabilization. Our projects implement the latest in bio-engineering and fluvial geomorphologic designs to ensure they are completed to the highest standard and are ecologically stable. In addition to waterway restoration, we have also had the opportunity to rehabilitate and create parklands through the construction of trails, boardwalks, and pedestrian bridges.

​

Our team has extensive experience and expertise in the field, and are able to complete projects in highly sensitive and difficult to access areas.  We own a fleet of specialized equipment which has been outfitted specifically for this type of work as we continue to develop new and innovative methods. We have a team of construction professionals with years of experience in naturalized planting, waterway restoration, and impact minimization.

​

We have collaborated on projects with conservation authorities, municipalities, ministries, and private owners to ensure that shoreline protection and stream repairs are done professionally and quickly with as little environmental impact as possible.

​

Safety is a priority to us - we are continually reviewing our processes and policies while implementing new methods to ensure we are operating as safe as possible. We are COR Certified and have an active account with ISNetworld & Avetta. We are fully insured and bonded.
name: RM CONSTRUCTION SERVICES
